content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I'm looking to rent it out for the highest price possible. What is your budget for the monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euros, but I would be willing to negotiate down if the apartment is in good condition and the landlord is responsible.

What is your proposal for the rental price?

Do you have any other requirements or concerns?

If I agree to the price, I will sign the lease agreement and pay the deposit. If I don't agree, I will leave and not continue the negotiation.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Understood, Max. I'm happy to hear that you're willing to negotiate. The apartment is in good condition, and I take full responsibility for any maintenance issues that may arise. Based on the size of the apartment and its location, I would propose a monthly rental price of 900 Euros. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses that you can expect to incur as a tenant.

Do you have any questions or concerns about the rental price or the lease agreement? If you agree to the price, I'm happy to proceed with the negotiation. However, if you're not willing to accept the rental price, I will need to terminate this conversation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm willing to accept the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I will sign the lease agreement and pay the deposit. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you, Max, for your willingness to accept the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I'm glad to hear that you're comfortable with the terms of the lease agreement. Please note that the deposit is non-refundable, and any damages caused by the tenant will be deducted from the deposit.

Once you sign the lease agreement, you'll need to pay the deposit of 1000 Euros within the next 7 days. After that, you can move into the apartment, and I'll take care of any necessary paperwork and arrangements.

I'm glad that we were able to reach an agreement, and I look forward to working with you as a tenant. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

Thank you again for your interest in the apartment, and I wish you a pleasant stay in Berlin.
name: Heinrich Heine
